title: Zeit Boostie Trends Forever 5/18: Martin Shkreli, Sinkhole, Apple, Elon Musk, Equal Pay, Russia
itunes:title: Zeit Boostie Trends Forever 5/18: Martin Shkreli, Sinkhole, Apple, Elon Musk, Equal Pay, Russia
description:
In this edition of Zeit Boostie Trends Forever, Miles and super producer Anna discuss Martin Shkreli being released from prison early, the hidden forest in a Chinese sinkhole,  Apple getting sued for blowing out a child's eardrums, the Musk/Twitter saga, equal pay for the U.S. Men's AND Women's national teams, and Russian state T.V. not being on board with the invasion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
